meanings.definition: A projecting block under the corona of the Doric cornice.
meanings.sent1: The mutules added a decorative touch to the cornice.
meanings.sent2: The architect carefully designed the mutules for the building's exterior.
meanings.sent3: The mutules on the cornice seemed to be playing hide and seek with the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The mutules stood out like tiny guardians watching over the structure.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the mutules as the charming blocks on top of the building.

meanings.definition: A projecting block under the corona of the Doric cornice.
meanings.sent1: During the renovation, the mutules were carefully restored to their original state.
meanings.sent2: The mutules were intricately carved to match the historical style of the architecture.
meanings.sent3: The mutules looked like small hats perched atop the cornice.
meanings.sent4: The mutules seemed to be holding up the weight of history on their shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The mutules were the finishing touch that made the building truly special.
